DOC.brief_summary: This study also aim raise awareness among patient health-care provider importance pre-travel health consultation preventive intervention prior international travel . Through appropriate health counseling , cancer patient less risk travel -related health complication thus better quality life overall improve sense wellbeing .
DOC.brief_title: International Travel Patterns Risk Behaviour Breast Cancer , Lymphoma Patients Bone Marrow Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant ( HSCT ) recipients Age > 18 year Status post bone marrow transplant within last five year Breast Cancer patient : Criteria 1 Criteria 2 and/or 3 Female age > 18 year current past history breast cancer Received systemic chemotherapy last five year Metastatic breast cancer disease ( stage IV ) Lymphoma : Criteria 1 Criteria 2 and/or 3 Age > 18 year current past history lymphoma Received systemic chemotherapy within 5 year Had active disease time within last 5 year Patients age < 18 year Breast cancer lymphoma patient clinical remission past 5 year Patients unable fill questionnaire due language barrier
DOC.keyword: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant ( HSCT ) recipient
